section.title: Sid
section.para: Zym_Controller_Plugin_Sid is a plugin that allows a session to be set from the url. Traditionally, the session identifier would be specified through a query parameter; however, this plugin allows the sid to be formed like so: /index/index/sid/ASD231sd123.

note.para: Specifying the session identifier in url's is a security risk. Be extra careful of what might happen.
